items.name: Starlight Tartare
items.description: Finely diced seasonal tuna with yuzu, avocado, and a touch of edible gold.

items.name: Nebula Carpaccio
items.description: Paper-thin slices of beetroot and radish, finished with truffle vinaigrette.

items.name: Lunar Croquettes
items.description: Crispy potato and fontina bites served with smoked saffron aioli.

items.name: Celestial Garden Dip
items.description: Roasted seasonal vegetables with comet herb oil and mozzarella cheese with a side of toasted bread slices.

items.name: Galactic Sea Bass
items.description: Pan-seared sea bass with a star anise glaze, served atop smoked leek pur√©e.

items.name: Nebula Lamb  Loin
items.description: Herb-crusted lamb loin with a rich black garlic jus, served with moonlit potato gratin.

items.name: Cosmic Mushroom Risotto
items.description: Creamy arborio rice with wild forest mushrooms, parmesan dust, and truffle oil.

items.name: Solar Flare Duck Breast
items.description: Crispy-skinned duck with a blood orange gastrique, served with celestial spiced lentils.

items.name: Stardust Chocolate Sphere
items.description: Dark chocolate sphere filled with passionfruit mousse and a cosmic reveal.

items.name: Aurora Meringue Cloud
items.description: Light, airy meringue with a lavender cream, freeze-dried berries, and golden syrup

items.name: Comet Lemon Tart
items.description: Tangy lemon curd on a crisp almond crust, topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and star sugar.

items.name: Moonlit Panna Cotta
items.description: Silky vanilla panna cotta with blackberry nebula compote and a sprinkle of silver dust.

items.name: Solar Citrus Elixir
items.description: Fresh-squeezed blood orange, yuzu, and sparkling mineral water, with a lemon twist.

items.name: Moonflower Iced Tea
items.description: Delicate jasmine tea with white peach and a hint of elderflower, lightly chilled.

items.name: Stardew Botanical Tonic
items.description: House-infused rosemary, cucumber, and lime with artisanal tonic water.

items.name: Nebula Cold Brew
items.description: Smooth single-origin cold brew with vanilla bean and a touch of oat milk.

items.name: Solar Flare Spirtz
items.description: Blood orange aperitif, prosecco, and a splash of sparkling water with a citrus twist.

items.name: Nebula Negroni
items.description: Gin, sweet vermouth, and a house-infused hibiscus Campari, served with an ice-sphere.

items.name: Midnight Orbit Martini
items.description: Vodka, elderflower liqueur, fresh lemon, and a shimmer of edible silver dust.

items.name: Eclipse Old Fashioned
items.description: Small-batch bourbon, smoked star anise syrup, orange bitters, and a flamed citrus peel.
